title: Kayla Takes Two
description: In this erotic short story set in a tropical island paradise, Ben and Cameron meet a young woman in the resort night club who has a fantasy she wishes to indulge. Desiring to experience two men at the same time, the three venture down to a secluded spot near the beach and indulge in a wild threesome under the stars. Adults only 18+
author: Darren G. Burton
